title: From the Velvets to the Voidoids
description: The Ramones. Suicide. Pere Ubu. This book explores the origins and evolution of the fiery history of punk and New Wave. Filled with insights from such music legends as Lou Reed, Debbie, Harry, David Byrne, Patti Smith, and Richard Hell, this book is a great read for music lovers and pop culture afficionados.
author: Clinton Heylin
